autokeywords.description: Set links to the keywords contained in the text in the enclosed blocks.

attributes.model: Specify when specifying a model other than 'keyword'.
attributes.name: Column name to get the 'name'.
attributes.title: Column name to get the 'title'.
attributes.class: Filter by class on a model with a class column.
attributes.tag: Build template tags instead of url columns.
attributes.no_title: Do not add the title attribute.
attributes.add_attr: Specify the attribute to add to the a element.
attributes.replace_once: Replace only the first occurrence of the keyword.
attributes.word_boundary: Only keywords that are adjacent to word boundaries are considered.
attributes.min_length: Add link only those with more than the specified number of characters.
attributes.enclosure: Enclose the tag in the specified string.
attributes.prefix: Prepends the specified string to the tag.
attributes.postfix: Adds the specified string after the tag.
attributes.include_workspaces: Keywords matching the given workspace_ids(Comma separated values or 'this' or 'children').
attributes.exclude_workspaces: Keywords excluding the specified workspace_ids(Comma separated values).

modifier_summarize.attribute: If you specify a number, the number of sentences, Specify "(number),wantarray" an array is returned.
